name: Patched
headline: Open-source workflow automation for dev teams
description: Patched empowers development teams to build and deploy AI-assisted workflows that can autonomously complete post-code tasks like documentation, code reviews, and security patching. Our workflows can be customized using a visual builder and can be self-hosted with any AI model, enabling automation without compromising security, control, or compliance.

founders.name: Rohan Sood, Co-Founder and CEO
founders.description: Rohan holds a Master's in optimization algorithms from NTU Singapore and is a second-time founder.  He closed millions in enterprise revenue from customers in the defense, energy, and healthcare sectors, before being acquired in 2023 and was a recipient of the million-dollar CSA Innovation Award from the Singapore government.

founders.name: Asankhaya Sharma, Co-Founder & Chief Technology Officer
founders.description: Asankhaya holds a PhD in static analysis from NUS, and was previously an Engineering Director at Veracode following the acquisition of his startup SourceClear. He has over a decade of experience leading engineering teams, has 40+ research publications, and received the ACM Distinguished Paper Award for his work on using machine learning for curating software vulnerabilities.

# Agentic workflows that secure, update and fix your code.
Open-source framework to review and patch code using your preferred LLM.
[Try Patched](https://patched.codes/<https:/app.patched.codes/signin>)[ Patchwork](https://patched.codes/<https:/github.com/patched-codes/patchwork>)
Backed by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/66985862ed372e0fe72968e4_YC.webp)
Combinator
## Customizable worklows that run in the background to improve your code. 
Use ready-to-go patchflows or create your own to fix bugs, patch vulnerabilities, update markdowns, migrate dependencies and more.
[GenerateREADME](https://patched.codes/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[CodeReview](https://patched.codes/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[+Create Your Own](https://patched.codes/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
GenerateREADME automatically generates documentation for a folder in your repository in form of a README.md file.
Command
patchwork GenerateREADME
Configuration
disable_branch disable_prforce_pr_creation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/66d511f0c103d9e4a7a3d25c_Generate%20README.png)
PRReview aims to automatically summarize and comment on PRs based on the changes made to the code repository.
Command
patchwork PRReview
Configuration
diff_summarydiff_suggestionmodelclient_base_url
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/6621bd7da070b7b710f9cdff_PRReview-Screenshot.png)
DependencyUpgrade patchflow aims to automatically update vulnerable versions of dependencies in your repository to the fixed version while mitigating breaking changes.
Command
patchwork DependencyUpgrade
Configuration
modelclient_base_urlanalyze_impactdisable_branchdisable_prforce_pr_creation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/6621bca636d81b0c8aba37d7_DependencyUpgrade-Screenshot.png)
Create your own patchflows using available steps and prompts - or write one from scratch if you need. You can also use the patchflow generator to create one from the patched app without writing a single line of code.
Command
patchwork YourOwnPatchflow
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/663c97874f7c0923195afabf_CreateYourOwn-Screenshot.png)
Patch Vulnerabilities
Upgrade Dependencies
Analyze Pull Requests
Generate Documentation
Triage Issues
Improve Code Quality
Fix Bugs
Create Tickets
Patch Vulnerabilities

### Frequently Asked Questions
Know more about the Patched app and our open-source framework Patchwork.
What is Patched?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
Patched is a managed service that allows you to use Patchwork without having to provision infrastructure or manage LLM endpoints and API costs. It also offers a user-friendly GUI, workflow builder and significant performance improvements over frontier models for supported tasks through prompt and inference optimization.
How is it different from Copilot?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
Copilot assists developers in their IDE to write code. Patched runs autonomously behind the scenes to automate tasks like reviews, triages, documentation, patching and more, as well as code maintenance tasks like vulnerability fixing or linting.
How do I try it out?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
You can try Patched by clicking on the [Get Started](https://patched.codes/<https:/app.patched.codes/signin>) button on the top-right, or follow the instructions on our [Github repository](https://patched.codes/<https:/github.com/patched-codes/patchwork>) to use the Command Line Interface (CLI).
What exactly is Patchwork?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
Patchwork is an open-source python framework that automates mundane tasks like reviews and documentation using LLMs. [You can check out the repository to learn more](https://patched.codes/<https:/github.com/patched-codes/patchwork>).
Is Patchwork free?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
Yes it is. You can find the source-code on [Github](https://patched.codes/<https:/github.com/patched-codes/patchwork>) and deploy it on your machine or CI/CD server for free. However, it does need an API key for the LLM you want to connect it with - but you can get even that for free from Patched.
I have more questions. Who do I talk to?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
We'd love to help you with your queries. You can write to us at contact@patched.codes, or find us on Discord.
Core Features
### Build the AI assistance you need. After all you're a dev, not a pilot.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/662129f7113cc8907869dccc_customizable.png)
Fully Customizable
Customize our patchflows or create new ones in minutes via code or our no-code builder, it's your call.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/66212d8916c789eab55b4d89_privacy.png)
Privacy First
Deploy patchwork within your own infrastructure with your own LLM API keys for complete privacy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/66d25211bce8d30d7b42a7f8_code.png)
No code, Low code and All Code
Generate patchflows using text prompts, visual builders or real python code - your choice!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/662130a11259918f43662142_opensource.png)
Free and Open Source
Patchwork is an open-source project and can be used for free, forever!
Integrations

# Blogs
Learn what's new and get a behind the scenes look at Patched
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6621d21d307de3e704511dc1/67517932b220cb639cc6442a_pgha-main.png)](https://patched.codes/</blog/github-actions-for-patched>)
[Now available: Github Actions for Patched](https://patched.codes/</blog/github-actions-for-patched>)
December 5, 2024
You can now use Patched in a single-click via Github Actions.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6621d21d307de3e704511dc1/66fb4e5b514089c50acad2cd_dllm-main.png)](https://patched.codes/</blog/discover-llm-assisted-workflow-opportunities-in-your-code>)
[Discover LLM-assisted workflow opportunities in your code](https://patched.codes/</blog/discover-llm-assisted-workflow-opportunities-in-your-code>)
September 26, 2024
We present a new tool -- Patched GitHub repo analyzer that helps users discover different kinds of LLM-assisted workflows in their code.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6621d21d307de3e704511dc1/66f3a1d69127c8603b00fdb4_Screenshot%202024-09-24%20at%204.50.15%E2%80%AFPM.png)](https://patched.codes/</blog/build-your-own-autofix-with-patchwork>)
[Build your own AutoFix with Patchwork](https://patched.codes/</blog/build-your-own-autofix-with-patchwork>)
September 25, 2024
We describe a patchflow for creating a customizable AutoFix tool that can automatically detect and fix software vulnerabilities using large language models (LLMs).

Use ready-to-go patchflows or create your own to fix bugs, patch vulnerabilities, update markdowns, migrate dependencies and more.

### Frequently Asked Questions
Know more about the Patched app and our open-source framework Patchwork.
What is Patched?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
Patched is a managed service that allows you to use Patchwork without having to provision infrastructure or manage LLM endpoints and API costs. It also offers a user-friendly GUI, workflow builder and significant performance improvements over frontier models for supported tasks through prompt and inference optimization.
How is it different from Copilot?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
Copilot assists developers in their IDE to write code. Patched runs autonomously behind the scenes to automate tasks like reviews, triages, documentation, patching and more, as well as code maintenance tasks like vulnerability fixing or linting.
How do I try it out?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
You can try Patched by clicking on the Get Started⟨3⟩ button on the top-right, or follow the instructions on our Github repository⟨2⟩ to use the Command Line Interface (CLI).
What exactly is Patchwork?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
Patchwork is an open-source python framework that automates mundane tasks like reviews and documentation using LLMs. You can check out the repository to learn more⟨2⟩.
Is Patchwork free?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
Yes it is. You can find the source-code on Github⟨2⟩ and deploy it on your machine or CI/CD server for free. However, it does need an API key for the LLM you want to connect it with - but you can get even that for free from Patched.
I have more questions. Who do I talk to?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3e_Plus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/65f5807ab018f5d03dceee3f_Minus.svg)
We'd love to help you with your queries. You can write to us at contact@patched.codes, or find us on Discord.
Core Features
### Build the AI assistance you need. After all you're a dev, not a pilot.

Fully Customizable
Customize our patchflows or create new ones in minutes via code or our no-code builder, it's your call.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f58079b018f5d03dceed8a/66212d8916c789eab55b4d89_privacy.png)
Privacy First
Deploy patchwork within your own infrastructure with your own LLM API keys for complete privacy.

No code, Low code and All Code
Generate patchflows using text prompts, visual builders or real python code - your choice!

Free and Open Source

generated_description:
### Patched: Automating Developer Workflows with Intelligence

**Overview**
Patched is an innovative startup focused on revolutionizing how development teams automate their workflows. Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch S24, this company operates out of San Francisco with a tight-knit team of two. Its mission is to provide open-source workflow automation that empowers developers without tying them down with the complexities of code maintenance.

**The Problem**
Every developer knows that post-code tasks—like documentation, code reviews, and security patching—can be tedious and time-consuming. They distract from actual coding. That's where Patched comes in, offering a solution that allows for automation while maintaining security and control over codebases.

**The Solution**
Patched achieves this through its core product, Patchwork—an open-source framework built to automate common coding tasks using AI. Users can create and deploy customizable workflows through a visual builder or by coding directly, enabling flexibility depending on team needs. The platform is designed to work with any AI model, so companies can reduce the risk of data exposure while still benefiting from AI's power.

**Key Features**
1. **Customizable Workflows**: Developers can leverage ready-made patchflows that handle tasks such as:
   - **Generating Documentation**: Automatically create README files and other documentation.
   - **Pull Request Review**: Summarize and comment on PRs based on changes.
   - **Dependency Management**: Automatically upgrade vulnerable dependencies while mitigating breaking changes.
   
2. **Privacy First**: Patched allows self-hosting of workflows, enabling full control over data and compliance.

3. **No-Code, Low-Code, and Full Code Options**: Whether you're a coding wizard or prefer a drag-and-drop approach, Patched accommodates all with its flexible interface.

4. **Free and Open Source**: Patchwork is completely free to use and continues to be an open-source resource, aligning with the ethos of community-driven development.

**Integration and Accessibility**
Patched integrates seamlessly with popular tools like GitHub, GitLab, and Jira, making it easy to incorporate into existing development cycles. They also boast over 10,000 monthly downloads and multiple integrations that streamline various aspects of the coding process.

**Pricing**
Patched adopts a usage-based pricing model. They offer:
- **Free Plan**: Always free with access to limited patchflows.
- **Pro Plan**: Starting at $99/month for increased limits and features.
- **Enterprise Plan**: Tailored pricing for larger teams with unlimited patchflows.

**Conclusion**
Patched is positioned to mitigate some major pain points in software development, enabling teams to focus on what really matters—building great products. As it continues to grow under the guidance of Y Combinator and with a clear mission to empower developers, Patched is certainly one to watch. For further details, visit [Patched](https://patched.codes).
